articles.title: Kim Jong Il InspectsIndustrial Establishments in Jagang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il InspectsIndustrial Establishments in Jagang

					 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to Jagang Province, helping it raise higher the flame kindled in South Hamgyong Province.
					
					 He was accompanied by Kim Jong Un, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, Ri Yong Ho, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee and chief of the General Staff of the Korean People's Army, Kim Kyong Hui, member of the Political Bureau and department director of the WPK Central Committee, Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee and vice-chairman of the NDC, Pak To Chun, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the WPK Central Committee, Ri Jae Il and Pak Pong Ju who are first vice-department directors of the WPK Central Committee and KPA Generals Pak Jae Gyong and Hyon Chol Hae.
					
					 The first leg of his guidance was the Kanggye General Tractor Plant.
					
					  After being briefed on the technological updating of the plant at the combined production control room, Kim Jong Il went round several shops and watched new products, learning in detail about the production.
					
					 Watching lines of CNC press and other machines and processed goods at each worksite, he expressed satisfaction with the fact that all the production processes have been put on a CNC basis and new technologies have been actively developed to produce quality goods.
					
					 At the processed plastic goods shop he carefully learned about the use and quality of goods produced during trial operation and listened to the feedback from users. Praising the patterns and value of use of those goods he urged to keep the production afloat with a main emphasis put on improving the quality of goods so as to satisfy the demand of customers.
					
					 He admired the modern renovation of previous equipment, highly estimating the officials, workers and technicians of the plant for solving scientific and technical problems by their own efforts and updating lots of latest equipment in a brief span of time in the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and creation, thereby opening up a prospect for increasing the production.
					
					 He dropped in at a sample exhibition room where he said the exhibits help know better about the history of the development of the plant and its might. Learning about the performance of new machine made by the plant, he was greatly satisfied with the successful development of the machine by our own efforts and with our own technology.
					
					 He watched fire sensor made by the employees of the plant by pooling efforts with teachers and researchers of Kim Chaek University of Technology true to the instructions given by him during his April visit. He praised them for having made the gear urgently needed for extinguishing fire.
					
					 He also went round a library newly built by the plant.
					
					 He watched coal briquettes made by mixing coal of low-calorific value with additive as well as the production process chart that were put on display at the library. He gave valuable instructions about it.
					
					 He expressed great expectation and conviction that the workers of the plant would perform miracle and feats in their drive to put the country's machine-building industry on a higher level. He had a photo taken with labor innovators, scientists and technicians of the plant.
					
					 The next leg of his guidance was the Jangjagang Machine Tool Factory.
					
					  Going round unmanned process of the machine processing shop equipped with CNC machine tools, robotized flexible production cells, unmanned carrier trucks and automatic warehouse, he acquainted himself in detail with the modernization and production of the factory.
					
					 The unmanned process is a production mode befitting a rich and powerful country as one production cycle lasts 8 hours with the production efficiency several times as much as that in the past even though the work requires complicated processes including technical preparation, production preparation and change of products composition, he said.
					
					 He personally proposed awarding Kim Il Sung Order to the factory that has put itself on a high modern and scientific basis true to the party's idea of pushing back the frontiers of the latest science and technology and Kim Il Sung Prize to the unmanned process design and high state commendations to officials, scientists, technicians and workers who performed feats in it.
					
					 He watched a performance given by the traveling art propaganda troupe of the factory.
					
					 He advanced tasks for the factory, saying it holds an important position in developing the country's machine-building industry. 
					
					 He then went over to the February 8 General Machinery Plant.
					
					 Conducted by plant officials, he went round the revolutionary museum.
					
					 Watching relics and historic data, Kim Jong Il recalled with deep emotion the glorious path of development covered by the plant that has turned into a modern machine and equipment manufacturing plant under the wise guidance of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Going round several places of the plant he learned about the production and newly produced machines.
					
					 Carefully learning about the structure, principle of operation and performance of ultramodern machines produced by the workers of the plant in the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance, he expressed satisfaction, speaking highly of those machines and the workers who made them. People will surprise if they see them, he added.
					
					 The people in Jagang Province have produced modern and new type machines as required by the age of knowledge-based economy by giving full play to the spirit of Kanggye. This proves that the country's machine-building industry has been put on a cutting-edge level, he noted.
					
					 He also watched new metal material researched and developed by the plant. 
					
					 He gave precious teachings to introduce the latest scientific and technical successes to the production, underscoring the need to increase the production of new machines and raise their utility rate on the basis of the successes already made by the plant.
					
					 The next leg of his guidance was the Huichon Ryonha General Machinery Plant.
					
					 Touring CNC 1 and CNC 2 Shops and other places of the plant, he acquainted himself in detail with the production and development of new products.
					
					 Watching 3-axis, 4-axis and 5-axis and other CNC machine tools being churned out in an endless stream at each modern worksite smacking of industrialization which is bigger than several football stadiums, he expressed great satisfaction over the leaping progress made by the plant in the production of the latest CNC machine tools. 
					
					 The workers of the plant and scientists and technicians of the Ryonha Machine Management Bureau have produced spare parts of CNC machine tools including main shaft, tool rest, hydraulic booster and ball screw, which had previously been imported, by their own efforts and with their own technology. Therefore, they massively increased the proportion of local production of spare parts in a matter of less than one year and sharply increased the competitiveness of the DPRK-made CNC machine tools at international markets. He highly estimated their efforts.
					
					 Workers processed products with not much difficulty with the help of newly developed 6-axis CNC grinder, the products whose precision was difficult to provide even though they went through complicated processes with the use of various machines in the past. He admired them and expressed his great pleasure.
					
					 It is something surprising that they completed spare parts processing in the main in the wake of finishing the design of 11-axis composite processing center, a mother machine for processing the main body of machine tool, and entered into their assembling as taught by him during his field guidance last year, he noted.
					
					 He also highly estimated the fact that they newly developed geothermal pump, which is easy to make and has low cost and very high heat efficiency, and manufactured modern bottle machines to be sent to the Nampho Glass Bottle Factory.
					
					 He learned about the details of the efficiency of geothermal cooling and heating system introduced to the plant last year.
					
					 Noting that the recent achievements made in the plant hold as great significance as the industrial revolution in the new century, he said that the plant serves as national treasure.
					
					 Saying that the plant holds an important position in developing the machine-building industry of the country, he set forth the tasks to be fulfilled by the plant.
					
					 He underscored the need for the plant to increase the CNC machine tool production based on the already achieved successes and, at the same time, wage a dynamic drive to develop and produce more high performance CNC equipment of high speed, precision and intelligence.
					
					 He stressed the particular need to produce at an early date the mother machine for processing the main bodies of CNC machine tools.  He promised to come back to the plant with bouquets of congratulations upon the news of the production of the mother machine.
					
					 The officials, labor innovators, scientists and technicians of the Huichon Ryonha General Machinery Plant and the Ryonha Machine Management Bureau who performed distinguished feats in CNC realization are the most valuable assets of the country, he noted, personally inviting them to come to Pyongyang.
					
					  He also visited the Huichon Precision Machine Plant.
					
					 After being briefed on the updating of the newly renovated fuel pump workshop at the general control room of the plant, he toured production site.
					
					 Very pleased to see production processes furnished with CNC equipment of high performance and newly-manufactured products, he said: Basing themselves on the latest science and technology, the workers of the plant opened up a bright prospect for radically increasing the production by successfully finishing the difficult and knotty technological updating project that requires high technology.
					
					 It is good that the workers have used such advanced test apparatuses as air measuring instrument and three-dimensional measuring instrument to gauge the quality of their processed products, thus definitely ensuring the quality of products, he said.
					
					 He said it has become possible to smoothly ensure the accessory processing, which had been done with other countries' help because of imperfect production processes, with domestic equipment at domestic plant.
					
					 It is innovation and rapid progress in developing the nation's automobile industry onto a high level that the plant made it possible to ensure the processing of vehicle accessories requiring the highest degree of precision satisfactorily with its own efforts, he noted, saying with pride: There is nothing impossible to do when determined.
					
					 Being told that every production process, including management of manpower and equipment, production guidance, designing and technological process, is controlled by computer after the establishment of combined production control system, he noted with high appreciation that the officials and workers of the plant did great thing in cooperation with Three-Revolution team members.
					
					 Praising again the plant for having become able to supply more quality accessories of not only lorry and tractor but also various vehicles requiring the supreme precision amid the high-pitched drive to push back the frontiers of latest science and technology, he urged it to make redoubled efforts for world competition, not conceited with the present success.
					
					 The reality in which vehicles grow rapidly in number needs more accessories, he said, advancing the concrete tasks and ways to satisfy the growing demand for accessory parts.
					
					 Busy as he was with his field guidance to Jagang Province, leader Kim Jong Il sent a gift to the family of Kim Song Nyo working as road-mender on Kubong Pass.

articles.title: Talks between DPRK and Russian Foreign Ministries Held
articles.content:
Talks between DPRK and Russian Foreign Ministries Held

					 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Kye Gwan, first vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK, respectively met and had talks with Andrey Denisov, first  deputy minister, and Aleksei Borodavkin, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of the Russian Federation, in Moscow on Friday. 
					
					 Present there were from the DPRK side Kim Kye Gwan and his party and the DPRK ambassador to Russia, and from the Russian side officials concerned. 
					
					 The talks had sincere discussions on the ways to comprehensively develop the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and Russia by implementing the agreements reached at the DPRK-Russia summit and talks in Ulan-Ude during leader Kim Jong Il's historic visit to Siberia and Far East regions of Russia. 
					
					 At the talks opinions over the situation of Northeast Asia including the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula were exchanged and the DPRK and Russia agreed to continue cooperation for peace and security in the region in the future.

articles.title: CPRK Hits Anti-DPRK War Exercises
articles.content:
CPRK Hits Anti-DPRK War Exercises

					 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea Saturday released its information bulletin No. 985 to condemn the south Korean warmongers for launching provocative anti-DPRK war exercises Hoguk across south Korea on October 27. 
					
					Involved in the exercises to last till Nov. 4 are more than 140,000 troops of the three services and the marine corps of the south Korean puppet forces and U.S. forces and various military equipment, including warships, fighters and helicopters, it said, and went on:
					
					 The frantic war exercises are being conducted on the ground and in the air and sea. 
					
					 In particular, the south Korean puppet army is staging large-scale rehearsal in Paekryong Island on the West Sea of Korea, an area standing in acute military confrontation with the DPRK, while seeking to have joint landing exercises with the U.S. imperialist aggression forces in Phohang, North Kyongsang Province. 
					
					 The exercises are a blatant challenge to the public opinion at home and abroad desirous of peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and an unpardonable military provocation to the DPRK. 
					
					 The south Korean puppet military asserts that the current exercises are to cope with the "local provocation" by someone. But it is nothing but sophism to cover up their belligerence and deceive the people at home and abroad critical of them. 
					
					 The Hoguk exercises are a very dangerous preliminary war for invasion of the DPRK as they may go over to an actual war anytime in view of scale and content of armed forces involved and their intensity. 
					
					 The reality clearly shows that the U.S. and the south Korean authorities talk about "dialogue" but, in actuality, are watching for a chance to ignite a war by aggravating the situation on the Korean Peninsula and its vicinity. 
					
					 No one can guess when the puppet warmongers' reckless war exercises and military provocation would spill into what crisis.
					
					 As there is the saying "Curses come home to roost", their frantic moves for confrontation and war against the DPRK will only hasten their own destruction. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should stop at once the reckless military actions, clearly mindful of catastrophic consequences to be entailed by their scheme to provoke a war.

articles.title: Visits
articles.content:
Visits

					 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- The DPRK delegation of the Bureau of Earthquake headed by Director Jang Jong Nam returned home by air on Saturday after visiting China.
					
					The Delegation for the Relations with Korean Peninsula of the European Parliament headed by Chairman Christian Ehler arrived here on Saturday.
					
					 On the same day Yun Gongmin, general manager of the Hetian Group Company of China, and his party returned home.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung

					 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Japan Society for Study of the Juche Idea laid a floral basket before the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Ryongnam Hill here on Saturday.
					
					 It placed the floral basket before the statue and paid tribute in boundless reverence to the President.
					
					 The delegation arrived here on the same day.

articles.title: Chinese Impression of Opera "Liang Shanbo and Zhu Yingtai"
articles.content:
Chinese Impression of Opera "Liang Shanbo and Zhu Yingtai"

					 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Artistes of the Phibada Opera Troupe of the DPRK staged the opera "Liang Shanbo and Zhu Yingtai" at the Dong Fang Grand Theater in Changchun City, Jilin Province of China on Wednesday. It was the second day performance.
					
					 The director of the Office of the Commerce Department in Jilin Province said the performance was beyond imagination. 
					
					 Even though the language was different, feelings helped understand the content of the opera, he said.
					
					 I had an opportunity to see the high level of art of the DPRK, he added.
					
					 The manager of the Production Company in Wuhan City said the performance was flawless, adding:
					
					 Music of the opera was created the way it could easily be understood by the Chinese people.
					
					 The level of composers is very high.
					
					 The first part of the opera stands in sharp contrast with the latter part which is most impressive.
					
					 Unique dances go also beyond imagination.
					
					 The head of the Jilin Provincial Symphony Orchestra said:
					
					 The performance evokes live response from the audience. The orchestral music, dance and pangchang (off-stage song) are perfect and of very high standard. The performance helps learn a lot.
					
					 The manager of the Jilin Provincial Production Company said:
					
					 Many foreign art groups gave performances in Jilin Province.
					
					 Among them, the DPRK art group is most popular.
					
					 I will do my best to provide everything needed for the performance if the DPRK art groups visit Jilin.
					
					 The state first class actor who is vocal teacher of the Northeast University of Education said the opera was created and completed under the deep care of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, extending thanks to him for sending such a good art troupe to China.

articles.title: Mosaics Portraying Great Persons Built in DPRK
articles.content:
Mosaics Portraying Great Persons Built in DPRK

					 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Mosaics portraying the three commanders of Mt. Paektu have been recently erected at different units in the DPRK.
					
					 The Sijung Mine and the Namyang Saltern built mosaics "The great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung will always be with us" with ardent yearning for President Kim Il Sung who devoted all his life to the prosperity of the country and the happiness of the people.
					
					 The mosaic in Songjang-ri, Janggang County, Jagang Province, portrayed the President who set out on the 1,000-ri Journey for learning, cherishing his father's teaching that he should know about Korea well.
					
					 Mosaic "President Kim Il Sung providing field guidance to Kwangpho Duck Farm" was built at the Kwangpho Duck Farm, "Personally weighing vegetables" at the Sosin Vegetable Co-op Farm in Ryokpho District, Pyongyang and "In every field of rich harvest" in Ryangdam-ri, Unchon County, South Hwanghae Province.
					
					 The mosaic "On Mt. Paektu", erected in Chungsong-dong, Kanggye City, shows the people's boundless reverence for the President and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Among them are also mosaics "President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il among the coal miners", "President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il visiting the farm fields". They reflect the will of officials, coal miners and agricultural workers of the Konggup Coal Mine in Jagang Province and Changmae-ri, Yonthan County, North Hwanghae Province to make signal contribution to the building of a rich and powerful country true to the noble intention of the peerlessly great persons.
					
					 Built in Haeju City was mosaic "President Kim Il Sung and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk looking at the sunrise of Korea on Jong Il Peak".
					
					 The mosaic at Samhung Secondary School portrayed the President and the woman commander of Mt. Paektu, who visited the school on the first anniversary of its establishment and showed warm benevolence, naming the school so that it could train the students to be pillars for building a new country with ample knowledge, high morality and strong body.

articles.title: New Documentary Produced
articles.content:
New Documentary Produced

					 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- The Juvenile Film Production Company of Pyongyang University of Dramatic and Cinematic Arts recently produced a documentary film "Blessed Happy Children". 
					
					 The film shows picture of happy Korean children growing up with no more to desire under the care of General Secretary Kim Jong Il who is devoting himself to posterity with a noble outlook on the future. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il happily accepted the request of ordinary people to name their newborn babies though he was very busy with his field guidance. 
					
					 Among them are such children as Hong Dan in Mt. Paektu area, Chuk Bok who is daughter of a pro-reunification patriotic fighter and Kwang Myong who is son of a couple of discharged soldiers in Wonsan Youth Power Station. This shows the particular care shown by Kim Jong Il who is very much pleased with the birth of new lives. 
					
					 Kyong Yon, who was born during the days of contest of art groups of military families, and So Gum, daughter of a couple of builders of Kwangmyongsong Saltern, are also blessed by him. 
					
					The film vividly portrays the appearance of children growing up to be able workers who would shoulder upon the future of a powerful and prosperous nation amid the deep interest of the people across the country, while conveying beautiful stories touching the heartstrings of the people.

articles.title: Simwon Temple
articles.content:
Simwon Temple

					 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- There is Simwon Temple in Sangyang-ri, Pakchon County, North Phyongan Province.   
					
					 According to its epitaph, the temple was built by Hyon Uk (786-868) and rebuilt in 1368.  
					
					 The main building of the temple is Pogwang Shrine. The colorfully painted building is decorated with dragon, phoenix and other sculptures. It serves as a valuable thing in studying the architecture of Koryo kingdom (early 10th century-late 14th century).
					
					 Chongphung and Hyangro pavilions are also included in the temple.
					
					 Hanging on the front wall of Chongphung Pavilion is a wood-made fish 2.5 meters long and 100 kilograms weigh.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited the temple in February Juche 92 (2003) and said it was a precious cultural heritage showing excellent architecture and artistic talent of the Korean nation.

articles.title: Rim Je, Famous Writer of Ri Dynasty
articles.content:
Rim Je, Famous Writer of Ri Dynasty

					 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Rim Je is well known as a progressive writer of Ri Dynasty (1392-1910).
					
					 Rim, born of a noble family, devoted himself to academic pursuits and writing together with Jong Chol, Ri I and other celebrated writers.
					
					 He, who hated feudalism, toured many areas of the country, enjoying the beautiful scenery and experiencing the poor living conditions of the common people.
					
					 He wrote many poems and fables critical of feudal rulers imposing sufferings and misfortune on common people through exploitation and compulsory labor.
					
					 He became famous for his works properly depicting the actual conditions of the country.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work

					 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday dedicates a bylined article to the 20th anniversary of the publication of the famous work of General Secretary Kim Jong Il "Let Us Bring About a New Turn in Developing Science and Technology". 
					
					 The work, published on Oct. 28, Juche 80 (1991), refers to the importance and significance of developing science and technology in defending and glorifying Korean-style socialism. It also clearly indicates the tasks for successfully attaining the goal of developing science and technology. 
					
					 The two decades since the publication of the work were shining period during which a fresh turn has been effected in developing science and technology of the country under the wise guidance of the Workers' Party of Korea, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 Modern industrial establishments that have been put on the Juche-oriented CNC basis mushroomed in different parts of the country and a bright prospect for the use of solar heat energy and geothermal water opened. This is a precious fruition of the party's line on attaching importance to science and technology.
					
					 Fundamental in scientific research is to develop science and technology, embody collectivism and combine scientific research and production in an organic way as required by the party and the revolution from the Juche-based stand. Only then would it be possible to make scientific and technical achievements truly conducive to socialist construction. 
					
					 The miracle wrought by the people in Hungnam clearly shows that scientists and technicians can open the wide avenue of a rich and powerful country only when they arm themselves with the Juche idea of the Workers' Party of Korea and fully display the scientific creativity under the banner of self-reliance.

articles.title: Minju Joson on Results of By-election in South Korea
articles.content:
Minju Joson on Results of By-election in South Korea

					 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- The results of the recent by-election in south Korea reflect the south Korean people's mindset desirous of independence, democracy, national reconciliation and unity and reunification, observes Minju Joson Saturday in a by-lined commentary.
					
					 It continues:
					
					 The conservative forces left no means untried to win the recent Seoul mayoral election. The U.S. openly supported the conservative forces, claiming that the leftist camp's victory may jeopardize the "alliance" with it. Their despicable moves, however, touched off strong opposition among the south Korean people.
					
					 The candidate from the forces for democratic reforms made policy commitments to building a new society in reflection of the public mindset. Many civic and public organizations including youth and students organizations and reunification movement organizations and opposition parties joined the committee of measures for the election of the candidate from forces for democratic reforms and conducted brisk activities to help him gain votes.
					
					 As a result, the candidate from the forces for progressive and democratic reforms was elected Seoul mayor, foiling the high-handed and arbitrary practices, plots and intrigues of the conservative group.
					
					 Through the recent election the south Korean people gained precious experience that if they go united, they can do anything.
					
					 In the election they clearly demonstrated their wish and willingness for independence, democracy and reunification. Pro-American sycophants who get frantic with fascist suppression and confrontation with fellow countrymen, swimming against the people's mindset, have no future. This is the main review of the recent election.
					
					 With no desperate efforts can the conservative group hold in check the struggle of the people for new independent and democratic politics, a new life and national reunification. They will only precipitate its miserable end.

articles.title: Japan's Attempt at Overseas Aggression Disclosed
articles.content:
Japan's Attempt at Overseas Aggression Disclosed

					 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries have become earnest in their attempt to launch overseas aggression, while calling for easing the "three principles of arms export" and dispatching the Ground "Self-Defense Force" (SDF) to South Sudan.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a by-lined commentary.
					
					 Their moves are little different from digging their own graves, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Japan regards the "three principles for arms export" as a block lying in the way of turning it into a military giant and realizing its wild ambition for overseas aggression. It has long dreamed of focusing its technical potentials on the joint development of the arms. Japan tries to give impression that its joining the development of missile defense system in recent years was under the U.S. pressure. It is now working hard to tighten alliance with the U.S. and attain its sinister goal. Japan's desperate efforts to purchase and develop the latest stealth fighters and drones are aimed to serve this purpose.
					
					 It is highly disturbing developments that Japan seeks to dispatch the Ground SDF to South Sudan. This is aimed to help it accumulate the experience of battles overseas.
					
					 By letting the Maritime and Ground SDFs enrich the experience in military operations in other regions and countries, Japan seeks to favorably use them in wars of aggression on Asian countries. Herein lie the gravity and danger of Japan's attempted dispatch of the Ground SDF to South Sudan.
					
					 Japan has emerged the biggest country of military expenditure next to the U.S. in the West. The "Self-Defense Forces" have fully taken up their shape as offense-type aggression forces after going beyond the scope of "defense." It is clear that in case the SDFs launch aggression, it would seriously disturb global peace and security and bring horrible disaster to mankind.
					
					 Japan imbues its younger generation with wrong view of history and its lawmakers continue paying group visits to the Yasukuni Shrine. The recent moves in Japan under the influence of militarism indicate that its ambition for aggression has gone beyond the danger line.
					
					 Japan had better stop reckless act.

articles.title: Protest against Ratification of FTA in S. Korea
articles.content:
Protest against Ratification of FTA in S. Korea

					 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- A strong protest of south Korean people from all walks of life was launched in Seoul on Friday against the puppet National Assembly's ratification of the humiliating FTA with the U.S.
					
					 Delegates of 36 peasants organizations including the Federation of Peasants Associations and the Peasants' Solidarity held a rally in Youido.
					
					 Terming the FTA with the U.S. an unfair agreement which destroys agriculture and kills people on this land, they declared the will to stage a death-defying resistance to prevent the NA's ratification without fail.
					
					 It was followed by the all-people rally against the conclusion of the humiliating agreement sponsored by the All-People Measure Committee for Opposing south Korea-U.S. FTA. 
					
					 Present there were more than 10,000 people of all social standings including workers, peasants and students.
					
					 At the rally speakers denounced the "Grand National Party" for trying to pass through the NA the "motion calling for the ratification of FTA" in a bid to conclude the unfair agreement at any cost.
					
					 Those lawmakers voting for the conclusion of the agreement will be surely punished at the next year's elections, they warned.
					
					 They strongly demanded the ruling party and the "government" stop the move to pass the motion and scrap the FTA at once.
					
					 At the end of the rally the participants staged demonstration, chanting slogan "No NA's ratification of the FTA!"
					
					 The protest compelled the GNP to cancel the plan to railroad the motion at the plenary session of the NA.

articles.title: S. Korean Civic Organizations Oppose Conclusion of FTA
articles.content:
S. Korean Civic Organizations Oppose Conclusion of FTA

					 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- The Headquarters of the All-People Movement for Checking the Conclusion of the south Korea-U.S. Free Trade Agreement which consists of various civic and social organizations of south Korea and the preparatory committee of the People's Strength for Building New World held a candlelight rally in Youido, Seoul on October 27. They declared an action to check the conclusion of the FTA with the U.S.  
					
					 At the rally, the speakers said that the conclusion of the FTA with the U.S. would cause great damage as it is little short of leaving the south Korean markets to the tender mercy of the U.S.
					
					 The "Grand National Party" is attempting to pass through the "National Assembly" (NA) the motion calling for the ratification of FTA, they deplored.
					
					 To prevent this, the people from all walks of life should get united and turn out as in 2008 candlelight struggle and judge without fail the group of traitors, they stressed.
					
					 They would launch a big rally and demonstration to prevent the NA passage of the motion, they declared.

articles.title: S. Korean Media on Results of By-election
articles.content:
S. Korean Media on Results of By-election

					 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Media of south Korea on Thursday described the defeat of the "Grand National Party" in the recent Seoul mayoral election as punishment by the public.
					
					 KBS said that the south Korean people turned away their faces from the GNP in the recent by-election, dealing a telling blow to the rule by the authorities and the ruling party.
					
					 Pak Won Sun, an independent candidate, won in the Seoul mayoral race by defeating Ra Kyong Won, a candidate from the GNP, it noted, adding this confirmed the people's distrust in the present authorities.
					
					 Yonhap News reported the election results reflected the strong demands for change in the policies related to such issues as youth unemployment, registration fee, house price and job.
					
					 Seoul Sinmun in its editorial said that the election gave an alarm to the present political camp and taught a lesson that if they go against the people's will they would go to ruin.
					
					 Hangyore said in an editorial that the people's mindset erupted through the Seoul mayoral election was punishment of the present "government" and the arrogant GNP. The conservative forces strengthened their nexus more than ever before but eventually failed to block the great public sentiment, it said.
					
					 The recent election gave the GNP a lesson that there would be no future for the GNP if it continues downplaying the trend of huge changes.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of Progressives Flailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of Progressives Flailed

					 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea made public a statement on Thursday, condemning the authorities for retaliatory suppression of the progressive forces.
					
					 On Oct. 27 the North Kyongsang provincial police agency searched the houses of the secretary general of the Taegu and North Kyongsang Provincial Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty and the executive chairperson of the Taegu and North Kyongsang Provincial Federation of University Student Councils, the statement noted.
					
					 Such suppression of members of the progressive organizations is a mean action in retaliation for the defeat in the Seoul mayoral election, it charged.
					
					 The recent election's results were just the people's punishment of the present "government" and the "Grand National Party", the statement said.
					
					 It scathingly accused the authorities of seeking to recover the consequences of their arrogant and arbitrary practices with fascist suppression.

articles.title: Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung Observed in Poland
articles.content:
Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung Observed in Poland

					 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held in Poland on Oct. 21 in commemoration of the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung. 
					
					Displayed at its venue were works of the President and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, photos on their exploits and publications on the DPRK.
					
					 Attending it were personages of the Polish preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of Kim Il Sung, the Central Committee of the Poland-Korea Association and its branches and the Opatow County Office and popular masses.
					
					 The ambassador and officials of the DPRK embassy in Warsaw were present on invitation.
					
					 Slaboy January Guzowski, chairman of the C.C., Poland-Korea Association, praised Kim Il Sung as a genuine people's statesman who devoted all his life to the dignity of the nation and prosperity of the country. 
					
					 That's why the Korean people are holding him in high esteem as the eternal President of the DPRK while invariably carrying forward his idea and intentions. 
					
					 The secretary general of the Association and other speakers said that thanks to the prominent leaders the Korean people could always emerge victorious with the most correct idea and line. 
					
					 The modern history of the DPRK would have been unthinkable without the august name of the President, they stressed.
					
					 Poland, too, is associated with sacred revolutionary activities of the President, they said, confirming that the friendship between the peoples of Poland and the DPRK would last forever.

articles.title: WPK Anniversary Marked in UK and Russia
articles.content:
WPK Anniversary Marked in UK and Russia

					 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Seminars and film shows were held in UK and Russia from October 21 to 24 on the 66th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 85th anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU).
					
					 The chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy said the DIU founded by President Kim Il Sung provided the historic roots of the WPK. It was a genuine revolutionary organization of young vanguard of the new generation who broke with factionalism and flunkeyism, he noted.
					
					 The WPK is vigorously struggling for the socialist cause and the world revolution upholding the banner of independence, he said, referring to the brilliant course covered by the WPK.
					
					  The chairman of the Moscow Southwest Administrative District Committee of the Chernobyl Unification Union of Russia said General Secretary Kim Jong Il's visit to Russia was an event of great international significance. Boosting the Russia-DPRK friendship fully complies with the interests of the peoples of the two countries, he added.
					
					 He praised the Korean People's Army united close around Kim Jong Il as an invincible army with loyalty to the party and the leader and iron discipline.

articles.title: China Expands Cooperation with Angola and Vietnam
articles.content:
China Expands Cooperation with Angola and Vietnam

					China Expands Cooperation with Angola and Vietnam Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- China and Angola agreed to expand cooperation in energy, finance, agriculture and culture on Tuesday.
					
					 On the same day, China and Vietnam agreed to boost cooperation in combating corruption.

articles.title: Chinese FM Spokesperson Refers to Iran's Nuclear Issue
articles.content:
Chinese FM Spokesperson Refers to Iran's Nuclear Issue

					 Beijing, October 28 (KCNA) -- Jiang Yu, spokesperson for the Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs, at a press conference on October 25 referred to the way of settling Iran's nuclear issue.
					
					 She noted China consistently maintains that dialogues and talks are the correct way of settling the nuclear issue of Iran.
					
					 She hoped that the International Atomic Energy Agency would play a constructive role in promoting the diplomatic talks for settling the nuclear issue of Iran by actively cooperating with Iran from objective and fair attitude.

articles.title: Anhui Province of China Strives to Solve Drinking Water Issue
articles.content:
Anhui Province of China Strives to Solve Drinking Water Issue

					 Beijing, October 28 (KCNA) -- Anhui Province of China has exerted big efforts to provide sufficient drinking water to rural residents. 
					
					 The province rebuilt and repaired 1,376 wells for the past five years. 
					
					 It plans to rebuild and repair more 2,225 wells within the upcoming 5 years.

articles.title: Russia Urges US to Lift Its Embargo on Cuba
articles.content:
ussia Urges US to Lift Its Embargo on Cuba

					 Moscow, October 28 (KCNA) -- The Russian Foreign Ministry in a statement on Thursday accused the United States of imposing embargo on Cuba.
					
					 The majority of the UN member states denounce the U.S. embargo on Cuba, the statement said, referring to a resolution adopted at the 66th UN General Assembly demanding the withdrawal of the economic, commercial and financial blockade on Cuba.
					
					 Russia supports the resolution on the basis of its principled stand and in obedience to the main article of the UN Charter which calls for disallowing any discriminative measure and interference in internal affairs, it said.
					
					 The statement strongly urged the U.S. to lift its anti-Cuba embargo.

articles.title: US and UK Media on By-election in S. Korea
articles.content:
US and UK Media on By-election in S. Korea

					 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- U.S. and UK newspapers reported that the results of Seoul mayoral election dealt a heavy blow at the "Grand National Party", according to the south Korean CBS on Thursday. 
					
					 The American paper Wall Street Journal said independent candidate Pak Won Sun, a progressive civil campaigner, won in the Seoul mayoral election and this gave a shock to the ruling GNP. 
					
					 The British paper Financial Times said the election of the independent candidate to the mayoral post by people from different social standings in Seoul dealt a heavy strike at the south Korean "president".

articles.title: US Companies' Profit Drops
articles.content:
US Companies' Profit Drops

					 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Delta Air Lines Inc. said Tuesday that its profit declined by 18 percent in the third quarter of 2011.
					
					 Ford Motor Co. on Wednesday announced that its third-quarter earnings decreased by 38 million dollars, or two percent.

articles.title: Number of Gangsters Increases in US
articles.content:
Number of Gangsters Increases in US

					 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Gangsters are rampaging through the streets in the U.S., committing all sorts of crimes.
					
					 The FBI said on October 21 quoting its survey data that the number of gangsters in the U.S. reached 1.4 million as of April this year.

articles.title: US Air Force Fighter Crashes in Nevada
articles.content:
US Air Force Fighter Crashes in Nevada

					 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- An F-15c Eagle fighter under the U.S. Air Force crashed during a training in Nevada State, the U.S. on Monday.

articles.title: Earthquake Occurs in US
articles.content:
Earthquake Occurs in US

					 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- A moderate 5.2 magnitude earthquake occurred on Thursday in northeastern California, the U.S.
					
					 The quake struck at a depth of 8.5 miles in a sparsely populated area 90 miles northeast of Sacramento, California.

articles.title: New Poll Finds Public Distrust of US Government at Record High
articles.content:
New Poll Finds Public Distrust of US Government at Record High

					 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- The U.S. public's distrust of the U.S. government reached a record high of 89 percent, while most Americans believe the country is on the wrong track, revealing a remarkable sense of pessimism and skepticism, according to a poll published on Wednesday.
					
					While 89 percent of Americans say they distrust government to do the right thing, 74 percent say the country is heading in the wrong direction and 84 percent disapprove of the U.S. Congress, according to the latest New York Times/CBS News poll.

articles.title: Nakaima Voices Ire over Japan-US Accord on Futenma Relocation
articles.content:
Nakaima Voices Ire over Japan-US Accord on Futenma Relocation

					 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Okinawa Gov. Hirokazu Nakaima voiced ire on Wednesday over Tuesday's agreement by the defense chiefs of Japan and the United States to speedily implement a bilateral accord to move a key U.S. base in Ginowan to the Henoko area in Nago, both in Okinawa.
					
					''Their selection of an area for which the consent of prefectural citizens is hard to secure is not consistent with (their promise) to relocate and return (the base in Ginowan) as soon as possible,'' he told reporters.

articles.title: Cooperation in Combating Desertification Called for
articles.content:
Cooperation in Combating Desertification Called for

					 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Niger's President Mahamadou Issoufou, making an address at an international conference on Monday, underscored the need to cooperate in the area of fighting against desertification of arable lands.
					
					He said in the current state of affairs where a minority of the people continues to pollute the environment while the majority continue to suffer, the people living in arid regions will bear the most negative effects of climate change which worsens the drought and famine situations.
					
					 He called on regional countries to strengthen scientific and technological cooperation in combating desertification.
					
					Issoufou reiterated his government's commitment to ensure that Niger achieves food security through the "3N Initiative".

articles.title: Brazilian President Inaugurates Longest Bridge in Amazon
articles.content:
Brazilian President Inaugurates Longest Bridge in Amazon

					Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Brazilian President Dilma Rousseff on Monday inaugurated a bridge crossing the Negro River, the longest bridge in the Amazon Rainforest region to date.
					
					The construction of the 3,595-meter-long bridge helped improve the traffic of the region.

articles.title: Northern-Central Italy Hit by Massive Flooding
articles.content:
Northern-Central Italy Hit by Massive Flooding

					 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Violent storms left 5 dead and 10 missing in central-northern Italy as heavy rains flooded rivers that inundated streets and destroyed bridges, local media said on Wednesday.
					
					 Roads and train tracks were closed, making rescues more complicated.

articles.title: Iranian President Hits West's Hegemonic Attitude
articles.content:
Iranian President Hits West's Hegemonic Attitude

					 Tehran, October 28 (KCNA) -- Iranian President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad sharply censured the hegemonic attitude of the West in his speech at a meeting on October 26.
					
					 He noted that the West is destroying stability everywhere in the world to gain its own interests and loot wealth of instable countries.
					
					 In particular, the U.S. has provoked wars and sown discord among countries to dominate them and plunder their wealth, he said, adding it is just the mastermind of bringing only disasters to the world.
					
					 He declared that the Iranian people would never allow the enemies' attempt to violate the sovereignty of the country.

articles.title: Brazilian President Urges Quick Action on Global Economic Crisis
articles.content:
Brazilian President Urges Quick Action on Global Economic Crisis

					 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Brazilian President Dilma Rousseff in a diplomatic talk on Tuesday accused the United States and Western countries of posing irresponsible stance as regards the global economic crisis.
					
					 She said she was concerned with the crisis and the possible escalation of the financial turmoil which would affect many other nations rather than those responsible for the crisis in the first place, strongly urging the U.S. and the West to take quick action to defuse the crisis.
					
					 It is necessary to prevent countries responsible for the economic panic from transferring the cost of the crisis to others, she stressed.

articles.title: Palestinian Leadership Slams Israeli FM's Comments against Abbas
articles.content:
Palestinian Leadership Slams Israeli FM's Comments against Abbas

					 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Israeli Foreign Minister Avigdor Lieberman tries to destroy peace by inciting against Palestinian National Authority President Mahmoud Abbas, the Palestinian presidency said Wednesday.
					
					 Nabil Abu Rdineh, Abbas' spokesman, said that Lieberman's remarks also aimed at "sabotaging the efforts" of the international Quartet, which started meetings between Palestinian and Israeli officials Wednesday in a bid to revive the peace talks. 
					
					  Israel is none other than the wrecker of peace and Palestinians positively support Abbas, he stressed.

articles.title: Nigeria Reiterates Commitment to Security
articles.content:
Nigeria Reiterates Commitment to Security

					Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian vice president reiterated the government's stand to address the nation's security challenges.
					
					The vice president said the area of concern the federal government was eager to address was security.
					
					 The government would continue to support the police in the discharge of its constitutional responsibility of maintaining law and order as well as protection of lives and property, he said.

articles.title: Iran Condemns NATO Presence in Afghanistan
articles.content:
Iran Condemns NATO Presence in Afghanistan

					 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Ali Larijani, speaker of the Iranian Majlis, at a meeting during his recent visit to Tajikistan, scathingly condemned NATO presence in Afghanistan.
					
					 Over 10 years of NATO presence the menace of terror and drug spread has not been removed but increased in Afghanistan, he said.
					
					 He noted NATO soldiers in Afghanistan colluded with terrorists and drug smugglers for material gains and were involved in carrying of drugs to other countries.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige en el terreno la provincia de Jagang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige en el terreno la provincia de Jagang

					Pyongyang, 29 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la provincia de Jagang fomentando el auge productivo originado de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Kim Jong Un, vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del PTC, Ri Yong Ho, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y jefe del Estado Mayor General del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Kim Kyong Hui, miembro del Buro Politico y jefa de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del CDN, Pak To Chun, miembro suplente del Buro Politico y secretario del CC del PTC, Ri Jae Il y Pak Pong Ju, primeros subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Pak Jae Gyong y Hyon Chol Hae, generales de ejercito del Ejercito Popular de Corea. 
					
					En primer lugar, el Dirigente visito el Combinado de Tractores de Kanggye. 
					
					Tras escuchar en la sala de mando de produccion integrada las explicaciones sobre la modernizacion tecnica de esa fabrica, recorrio varios talleres y vio nuevos productos enterandose en detalles del estado de produccion. 
					
					Al ver las prensas hechas aplicando la tecnologia CNC y otras maquinas y productos elaborados, alineados en los talleres, se mostro satisfecho de que la fabrica haya acondicionado todos los procesos productivos segun CNC e hiciera productos de buena calidad inventando e introduciendo nuevas tecnologias. 
					
					Averiguo en el taller de productos plasticos los usos y calidad de los productos hechos durante la operacion de prueba y escucho como piensan los usuarios. Estos productos tienen buenas formas y son muy utiles, dijo y anadio que se debe activar la produccion enfocandola en el mejoramiento cualitativo para satisfacer a los demandantes. 
					
					Es loable que los equipos viejos hayan sido modernizados, expreso y aprecio altamente el espiritu revolucionario de apoyarse en las fuerzas propias y el modo de creacion de los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos de la fabrica, quienes abrieron las perspectivas de aumento productivo al resolver por cuenta propia los problemas cientifico-tecnicos y renovar en un corto plazo muchos equipos como los sofisticados. 
					
					En la sala de exhibicion de muestras, dijo que aqui se puede conocer bien la historia de desarrollo y el poderio de la fabrica. Y al averiguar las especificaciones de las maquinas fabricadas nuevamente segun sus instrucciones, se puso muy contento de que ellas hayan sido desarrolladas con las fuerzas y tecnicas nacionales. 
					
					Para materializar las instrucciones dadas por el Dirigente durante su visita de orientacion en abril pasado, los empleados fabricaron el sensor de fuego en cooperacion con los profesores e investigadores de la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek. 
					
					El Dirigente encomio a ellos por haber fabricado bien ese aparato indispensable en la extincion de incendios. 
					
					Ese dia, el recorrio la biblioteca recien construida en la fabrica. 
					
					Dio valiosas instrucciones viendo las briquetas hechas con carbon de baja caloria e ingredientes agregados y el plano del proceso de produccion. 
					
					Expreso gran esperanza y conviccion de que los obreros del combinado realizaran milagros y meritos en la lucha por llevar a una etapa mas alta la industria de maquinaria del pais y tomo una fotografia de recuerdo junto a los innovadores laborales, cientificos y tecnicos de la fabrica. 
					
					El Dirigente estuvo a continuacion en la Fabrica de Maquinas Herramientas Jangjagang.
					
					Recorrio las celulas de produccion flexible compuestas de maquinas herramientas CNC y robots, y el proceso teledirigido del taller de elaboracion de maquinas formado por los vehiculos no tripulados de transporte, el deposito automatico, etc., cerciorandose de los detalles de modernizacion y produccion de la fabrica. 
					
					Este proceso de produccion es el apropiado al Estado prospero porque ha multiplicado la capacidad productiva y fijado en 8 horas el ciclo de produccion sin usar ninguna mano de obra aun en las complicadas condiciones de trabajo, tales como preparativos tecnicos y productivos y alteraciones de la composicion de productos, destaco.
					
					Propuso otorgar la Orden Kim Il Sung a la Fabrica de Maquinas Herramientas Jangjagang, que ha sido modernizada en alto nivel cientifico en acato a la idea del PTC de conquistar las tecnologias de punta, y el Premio Kim Il Sung al diseno del proceso teledirigido.
					
					Propuso tambien altas condecoraciones estatales a los funcionarios, cientificos, tecnicos y obreros que realizaron grandes meritos en esa obra. 
					
					El Dirigente vio ese dia la funcion del grupo artistico de agitacion movil de la fabrica. 
					
					Dijo que la fabrica ocupa una posicion importante en el desarrollo de la industria de maquinaria del pais e indico las tareas que incumben a ella. 
					
					El proximo destino del Dirigente fue el Combinado de Maquinaria 8 de Febrero. 
					
					Guiado por los funcionarios de la fabrica, el visito el museo de la historia revolucionaria.
					
					Pasando revista a los objetos y datos exhibidos, recordo con emocion el glorioso trayecto de desarrollo de la fabrica transformada en una moderna base de maquinaria bajo la sabia guia del Presidente Kim Il Sung. 
					
					Estuvo en varios puntos de la fabrica donde hizo conocimiento del estado de produccion y de las nuevas maquinas. 
					
					Al averiguar la estructura, el principio de funcionamiento y la eficacia de las maquinas sofisticadas fabricadas por los obreros de la fabrica usando el espiritu revolucionario de apoyarse en las fuerzas propias, las califico de excelentes y se mostro muy satisfecho diciendo que ellas son una gran sorpresa. 
					
					Los obreros fabricaron estas maquinas modernas de nuevo tipo, convenientes a la epoca de economia basada en intelectualidad, manifestando plenamente el indoblegable espiritu y el modo de trabajo de los habitantes de Kanggye, provincia de Jagang, dijo y agrego que esto comprueba que la industria de maquinaria de nuestro pais ha llegado al nivel sofisticado. 
					
					Ese dia, el Dirigente examino nuevos materiales metalicos desarrollados por la fabrica. 
					
					A base de los exitos ya alcanzados, la fabrica debe aumentar la produccion de nuevas maquinas y al mismo tiempo, elevar el rendimiento de ellas, apunto y dio preciosas instrucciones referentes a la aplicacion en la produccion de los logros cientifico-tecnicos de punta. 
					
					Acto seguido, el Dirigente visito el Combinado de Maquinaria Ryonha de Huichon. 
					
					En varios lugares de la fabrica, incluso los talleres CNC no. 1 y no. 2, se dio cuenta del estado de produccion y del desarrollo de nuevos productos. 
					
					Es muy espectacular el panorama de estos talleres modernos y de belleza industrial, cuya dimension supera la de 4 canchas de futbol juntos, donde se producen mucha cantidad de maquinas herramientas CNC como las de 3,4 y 5 ejes, dijo mostrandose muy satisfecho por el desarrollo vertiginoso registrado en la produccion de esos equipos mecanicos ultramodernos.
					
					Aprecio mucho el hecho de que los obreros de la fabrica y los cientificos y tecnicos de la Direccion de Maquinaria Ryonha aumentaron mucho en menos de un ano el porcentaje de produccion de accesorios con recursos nacionales y la competitividad mundial de las maquinas herramientas coreanas, al fabricar con fuerzas y tecnicas propias las piezas de maquinas herramientas CNC como el eje principal, las portaherramientas, etc., que eran renglones de importacion. 
					
					Se quedo muy regocijado al ver la nueva pulidora CNC de 6 ejes elaborando un producto cuya precision era muy dificil de garantizar antes aunque se usaban varias maquinas en un complicado proceso. 
					
					En particular, segun las tareas asignadas por el Dirigente durante su visita de orientacion del ano pasado, la fabrica concluyo el diseno de la elaboradora combinada con 11 ejes, maquina matriz para la elaboracion del cuerpo de maquinas herramientas, termino principalmente la elaboracion de sus accesorios y entro en el montaje, lo cual fue calificado por el de exito sorprendente. 
					
					Aprecio tambien el hecho de que la fabrica desarrollo nueva bomba geotermica que resulta facil de fabricar con menor costo y tiene alta eficiencia termica, y fabrico modernas moldeadoras de botella a ser enviadas a la Fabrica de Botellas de Vidrio de Nampho. 
					
					El Dirigente averiguo en detalles la eficacia del sistema de calefaccion y refrigeracion geotermicas establecido el ano pasado en la fabrica. 
					
					Los ultimos exitos de esta fabrica son tan significativos como una revolucion industrial del nuevo siglo, dijo y agrego que el Combinado de Maquinaria Ryonha de Huichon es una empresa con valor de patrimonio nacional. 
					
					El combinado ocupa una posicion importante en el desarrollo de la maquinaria del pais, subrayo e indico las tareas que debe cumplir esa fabrica. 
					
					La fabrica debe aumentar mas la produccion de las maquinas herramientas CNC basandose en los exitos ya alcanzados, y activar el desarrollo y la produccion de equipos CNC de gran velocidad y alta precision e inteligencia, instruyo.
					
					En particular, tiene que fabricar cuanto antes la maquina matriz para la elaboracion del cuerpo de maquinas herramientas CNC, dijo y prometio volver en ese caso con ramos de flores para felicitar. 
					
					Los funcionarios, innovadores laborales, cientificos y tecnicos del combinado y de la Direccion de Maquinaria Ryonha, que realizaron grandes meritos en la aplicacion de la tecnologia CNC, son tesoros del pais para quienes no hay nada que escatimar, apunto y los invito a Pyongyang.
					
					Por ultimo, estuvo en la Fabrica de Maquinas de Precision de Huichon.
					
					Luego de escuchar en la sala de control combinado las explicaciones sobre el estado de modernizacion de la fabrica filial de bomba de combustible reconstruida recientemente, el Dirigente recorrio los talleres de produccion.
					
					Viendo los procesos de produccion con eficientes equipos CNC y nuevos productos, se mostro muy satisfecho de que los obreros de la fabrica hayan abierto las perspectivas de aumento trascendental de la produccion, al concluir con exito la obra de reconstruccion tecnica tan dificil y complicada aplicando los exitos cientifico-tecnicos de punta.
					
					Es loable que se haya hecho posible garantizar la calidad de productos al facilitar a los obreros medir exactamente el estado cualitativo de sus productos con modernos equipos de control y medicion incluyendo el instrumento de medicion de aire y el medidor tridimensional, dijo.
					
					Antes realizabamos el procesamiento de accesorios con la ayuda de otros porque nos faltaba un perfecto y moderno proceso de produccion, pero desde ahora podemos hacerlo magnificamente en nuestra fabrica y con nuestros equipos, enfatizo.
					
					Esta fabrica puede elaborar satisfactoriamente los accesorios de medios de transporte que requieren de gran precision, dijo y agrego que esto significa una innovacion y salto que permiten situar en alto nivel la industria automovilistica del pais.
					
					Apunto con seguridad que desde ahora se puede hacer sin miedo cualquier cosa que se proponga.
					
					Informado de que todos los procesos de produccion, inclusive la administracion de mano de obra, el cuidado de equipos, el mando de produccion y los procesos tecnicos y de diseno, se controlan automaticamente con los ordenadores gracias al establecimiento del sistema integral de produccion y administracion, lo aprecio mucho diciendo que los funcionarios y obreros de la fabrica cumplieron un gran trabajo en cooperacion con los miembros del Grupo por las Tres Revoluciones.
					
					Volvio a elogiarlos altamente destacando que en el fragor de la lucha por conquistar las tecnologias de punta, esta fabrica puede producir en lo cualitativo y cuantitativo los accesorios de autos, tractores y otros vehiculos de alta precision.
					
					Les encomendo que compitieran con el mundo con sus productos redoblando los esfuerzos sin ufanarse de los exitos ya logrados.
					
					El incremento brusco de los medios de transporte demanda mayor cantidad de accesorios, expreso y presento las tareas y remedios detallados para satisfacer la creciente demanda de esas piezas.
					
					Si bien estuvo muy ocupado por sus visitas de orientacion sobre la provincia de Jagang, el Dirigente no olvido a los familiares de Kim Song Nyo, cuidadora de la carretera del pico Kubong, y les envio regalos.

articles.title: Conversan en Moscu funcionarios de MINREX de Corea y Rusia
articles.content:
Conversan en Moscu funcionarios de MINREX de Corea y Rusia

					Pyongyang, 29 de octubre (ACNC) -- El primer viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Kye Gwan, converso el dia 28 por separados en Moscu con su homologo Andrei Denisov y el viceministro del Exterior de la Federacion Rusa, Alexei Borodavkin.
					
					 En las conversaciones participaron por la parte coreana la comitiva de Kim y el embajador coreano en Rusia y por la rusa, los funcionarios interesados.
					
					 En las ocasiones fueron debatidos sinceramente los remedios para desarrollar globalmente las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion Corea-Rusia, al poner en practica los acuerdos alcanzados en la cumbre bilateral y las conversaciones que se llevaron a cabo en Ulan-Ude durante la historica visita del Dirigente Kim Jong Il a las regiones de Siberia y Lejano Oriente de Rusia.
					
					  Igualmente, ambas partes intercambiaron las opiniones sobre la situacion regional del Nordeste Asiatico, incluyendo el problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana, y acordaron seguir cooperando para preservar la paz y la seguridad de la region.

articles.title: CRPP denuncia simulacro Hoguk en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
CRPP denuncia simulacro Hoguk en Sur de Corea

					Pyongyang, 29 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica el dia 29 la informacion no. 985 de condena al provocativo simulacro "Hoguk" que los belicistas surcoreanos despliegan desde el dia 27 en toda la extension de su territorio. 
					
					En este entrenamiento que durara hasta 4 de noviembre, participan mas de 140 mil uniformados titeres de las fuerzas terrestres, navales y aereas y de la unidad marina del Sur de Corea, los efectivos norteamericanos, los buques, aviones de combate, helicopteros y otros pertrechos de guerra de distintas misiones, senala el documento y prosigue: 
					
					 Los ejercicios se libran de manera tridimensional en la tierra, el aire y el mar. 
					
					 En particular, los titeres desarrollan los ejercicios de gran envergadura en los alrededores de la isla Paekryong del Mar Oeste de Corea, donde ambas partes coreanas estan enfrentadas con armas, y al mismo tiempo, intentan librar en Phohang de la provincia de Kyongsang del Norte un simulacro conjunto de desembarco con las tropas agresoras norteamericanas. 
					
					 El presente simulacro deviene un desafio brutal a la opinion publica interna y externa que desea la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y una provocacion militar nunca tolerable contra la RPDC. 
					
					 Ahora la capa militar surcoreana describe el simulacro como un entrenamiento para hacer frente a la "provocacion local" de alguien. Pero, esto es una sofisteria para encubrir su caracter belicoso y enganar a la opinion publica interna y externa. 
					
					 Tomando en consideracion la dimension, el contenido y la intensidad, los ejercicios "Hoguk" resultan una guerra de ensayo contra la RPDC que pueda convertirse en cualquier momento en una guerra real. 
					
					 La realidad muestra claramente que EE.UU y la banda titere surcoreana hablan del "dialogo", pero, de hecho, intentan agravar la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno y acechan la oportunidad de provocar la guerra. 
					
					  Las autoridades surcoreanas deben poner de inmediato fin a sus imprudentes acciones militares, dandose clara cuenta de la consecuencia catastrofica que emane de ello.

articles.title: Resultado de elecciones refleja opinion publica, insiste Minju Joson
articles.content:
Resultado de elecciones refleja opinion publica, insiste Minju Joson

					Pyongyang, 29 de octubre (ACNC) -- El resultado de las elecciones suplementarias efectuadas en el Sur de Corea refleja la opinion publica de los habitantes surcoreanos aspirantes a la independencia, la democracia, la reconciliacion, la unidad y la reunificacion de la nacion.
					
					Asi subraya el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual difundido este sabado y continua:
					
					Esta vez, las fuerzas conservadoras surcoreanas se valieron de todos medios y metodos para ganar en las elecciones para el alcalde de Seul. EE.UU. tambien  dijo que serian peligrosas las "relaciones de alianza" si el campo de izquierda gana en las elecciones,  y apoyo de modo abierto a la banda conservadora.
					
					 Pero, las viles maniobras de EE.UU. y sus seguidores causaron una gran reaccion de los habitantes surcoreanos.
					
					El candidato a las fuerzas de reforma democratica presento los compromisos politicos de cambiar el mundo en reflejo de la opinion publica. Las entidades de jovenes y estudiantes, las de movimiento por la reunificacion y otras organizaciones civiles y sociales, asi como los partidos de oposicion se incorporaron al comite de medida de las elecciones del candidato a las fuerzas de reforma democratica y libraron dinamicamente sus actividades para echarle papeletas a favor. De esta manera, eligieron a su candidato como alcalde de Seul frustrando el despotismo y arbitrariedad, la estratagema y la ardid de la banda conservadora.
					
					A traves de las presentes elecciones, los habitantes surcoreanos aprendieron las preciosas experiencias de que si se unen no habra nada irrealizable.
					
					Ellos demostraron nitidamente su deseo y voluntad de la independencia, la democracia y la reintegracion. 
					
					El balance importante de esta vez es que no habra futuro para quienes recurren freneticamente al servilismo pro-EE.UU., la represion fascista y la confrontacion fratricida en contrapelo de la opinion publica.
					
					Por mas que maniobre desesperadamente, la banda conservadora no puede detener la lucha de los habitantes aspirantes a la nueva politica y la nueva vida independientes y democraticas sino acelerara su autodestruccion.
